name: apollos
description: A reactive framework for incredible applications

scripts.lint: eslint core give profile groups test
scripts.fix: eslint --fix core give profile groups test
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g NewSpring/Apollos
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:NewSpring/Apollos gh-pages --force
